DOC.brief_summary: The usability, skin reactions and accuracy of the FreeStyle Libre glucose monitoring system in children will be evaluated by questionnaires, pictures of the insertion site and comparison of the glucose results with capillary blood glucose determinations.
DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation of the FreeStyle Flash Glucose Monitoring System
DOC.criteria: type 1 diabetes mellitus being followed in the Pediatric Diabetes Unit of the Jessa Ziekenhuis
